===Overview===
The Santo Marco Armed Forces are the national defense of the [[Republic of Santo Marco]], and include the [[Santo Marco Army (Earth-616)|Santo Marco Army]] and [[Santo Marco Navy (Earth-616)|Navy]].{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Santo Marco (Country)|Santo Marco]]'s entry}}

===Augustine's rule===
Commander of the armed forces, [[Luis Augustine (Earth-616)|General Luis Augustine]] assumed control of Santo Marco after [[Max Eisenhardt (Earth-616)|Magneto]]'s departure.{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Santo Marco (Country)|Santo Marco]]'s entry}}

<!-- Around 2009 -->At some point, tension grew in the country, with television talking about tribal grudges and atrocities on both sides of the conflict. Despite the presence of international observers, including [[United Nations (Earth-616)|United Nations]] [[United Nations Peacekeeping Forces (Earth-616)|Blue Helmets]], president [[Luis Augustine (Earth-616)|General Luis Augustine]] had soldiers to gather citizens to stadiums to use a retrofitted [[Sentinels|Sentinel]] to gene scan them, separating out everyone from the same tribe as the main rebel leaders, before performing mass killings. The [[Santo Marco Armed Forces Death Squad 832 (Earth-616)|Death Squad 832]], operating under platoon leader [[C. Guzman (Earth-616)|C. Guzman]] had 1324 refugees killed.{{r|War Machine Vol 2 1}}

===Duarte's rule===
Years later, [[Emilio Duarte (Earth-616)|President Duarte]] had the capital bombed, possibly using the Armed Forces.<!-- {{r|Totally Awesome Hulk #20}} -->

At some point overthrown,{{r|Totally Awesome Hulk #20}} Duarte returned and had the [[Nuke Platoon (Earth-616)|Nuke Platoon]] (enhanced soldiers created using the technology from [[Frank Simpson (Earth-616)|Nuke]] who had been captured after a failed attempt at Duarte's life) to attack [[Homo superior|mutants]] and mutant sympathizers.{{r|Weapon X Vol 3 12}}
